meta.description: Debian 6.0.7 - amd64 Pre-Installed English with SSH and VirtIO support. Last update on 2013/09/28.
meta.install_notes:
Intall notes:	1. Clone the Image. 
 The image needs to be cloned and then attached to the server. 
 
 2. Connecting to your server via VNC. 
 a) Having installed a compatible VNC client, open a VNC connection to your server through the UI. 
 b) Enter your VNC url and VNC password as displayed on your Server Properties Window. 
 c) Start to configure your server. 
 
 3. Minimum Hardware Requirements. 
 The recommended minimum hardware requirements as publishes by Debian.org: 1GB RAM and 1GHrz CPU 
 
 4. Update your administrator password. 
 Please be aware that on startup you will be asked to enter the current password "password123" and set a secure password. 
 
 5. Setup your Debian. 
 By default the timezone and the language are set to Switzerland. 
 
 6. Configuring your Networking. 
 a) IP networking can be left as DHCP. Even if you are using a static IP address with this server our management layer will apply the same IP address via DHCP. Using DHCP ensures you will have no issues receiving the correct networking settings. We recommend using DHCP initially if only to receive all the correct networking settings. 
 b) CloudSigma employs an open networking infrastructure. All ports are open for inbound and outbound traffic with the exception of port 25 (SMTP) which is blocked for trial users. It is important that you secure access to your server according to your needs.
